apiLevelFlagDescription: Specify Android API level. Defaults to the latest API level installed.
reqs:devicename:title: Checking whether a virtual device with the specified name already exists.
reqs:devicename:fulfilledMessage: A virtual device with the name '%s' does not exist.
reqs:devicename:unfulfilledMessage: A virtual device with the name '%s' already exists.
reqs:devicetype:title: Validating specified device type.
reqs:devicetype:unfulfilledMessage: Device type '%s' is invalid. Must be one of the following valid types: %s
deviceCreateStatus: creating new virtual device '%s' of type '%s'
deviceCreateSuccessStatus: virtual device '%s' of type '%s' created successfully
